content.raw:
The error comes from [line 894](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/097fae5d041c79096f2f8fa2650acf119ae908f5/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc#physics_msgs.cc-894):
~~~
EXPECT_EQ(msg.joint_size(), jointSize);
~~~

`msg` is a Model message. Looking at the generate protobuf header file model.pb.h, I see the following:
~~~
inline int joint_size() const;
~~~

So I think `int` is the right type.
content.html:
The error comes from line 894:

EXPECT_EQ(msg.joint_size(), jointSize);

msg is a Model message. Looking at the generate protobuf header file model.pb.h, I see the following:

inline int joint_size() const;

So I think int is the right type.

content.html:
Do you think you include a fix for a homebrew warning that came from pull request #1838?

diff -r 46fb859b3958 test/integration/physics_msgs.cc
--- a/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc  Tue Aug 04 09:14:41 2015 -0700
+++ b/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc  Tue Aug 04 10:56:28 2015 -0700
@@ -887,7 +887,7 @@
   model->FillMsg(msg);

   // only ode supports gearbox joint
-  unsigned jointSize = 2;
+  int jointSize = 2;
   if (_physicsEngine == "ode")
     jointSize = 3;
